title: Buzzz Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Bakery, European, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic cafe with vegetarian options; vegans please inquire. Associated with the Bohol Bee Farm on Panglao Island. Has salads (one with edible flowers), a variety of cooked dishes, baked goods, squash bread and vegetarian chips with different spreads, and coconut-based ice cream with local flavors. Serves a complimentary appetizer. Operates restaurants in Island City Mall and in Galleria Luisa in Tagbilaran.
